q: SELECT c/name/value as composition, i/activities[at0001]/description[at0002]/items[at0070]/name/value as name, i/activities[at0001]/description[at0002]/items[at0070]/value/value as medication_item, i/activities[at0001]/description[at0009]/items[at0121]/name/value as instruction_name, i/activities[at0001]/description[at0009]/items[at0121]/value/value as service_request from EHR e CONTAINS COMPOSITION c [openEHR-EHR-COMPOSITION.encounter.v1] CONTAINS INSTRUCTION i
